Description.Text: This design hotel is located in the Niederrad district of Frankfurt, between the centre and Frankfurt Airport, which is some 5 km from the establishment. Located 200 m from the bus stop and Goldstein, it is a 20-minute walk from the Niederrad S-Bahn train station, which offers connections to the Frankfurter Messe exhibition centre. Restaurants and shopping venues are in the immediate proximity of the hotel.

The rooms feature designer furniture and WLAN Internet access. In addition to a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer, all come with air conditioning and heating units, a desk, flat-screen TV and DVD player.

In addition to a lobby area with 24-hour reception and check-out services and lift access to the upper floors, facilities available to guests at this air-conditioned design hotel include a breakfast room, Internet access in public areas, modern rooms and private parking (fees apply).
